column4: why is it that when i plug in my headphones i can't hear any audio, but my loudspeakers work perfectly fine?
there are no controls specific to the headphones
then Senjai has a point. My laptop's speakers shut off automagically when the jack goes in
how may 1/4 inch jacks you got?
how many input jacks are there on the laptop
for instance, my line out never works, so I must use the other out line
two, one for headphones and one for the mic
looks like there's a workaround involving getting the latest alsa driver
it's about half way down the pafe
probably wouldn't work, ubuntu comes with an even higher version of alsa and it still doesn't work
